column4: Is there any way to restore the system to a previous state by undoing installed/updated/deleted packages in Synaptic ? Any script for it ?
Anyone know where Synaptic keeps its history ?
/var/cache/apt/archives is where packages get dowloaded, is that what you want?

No, in Synaptic, you can have the history of what was made in the past (installed/updated/deleted packages). I know to know in which file it is stored... it should be one file only, but it could be one for each set of task also
